Name: Kiosk
Review Text: The staff here has much more attention for each other than for the customer. The coffee is pretty expensive as well, although tasty. Overall far from a stellar experience probably fuelled by lack of competition.

Name: Kiosk
Review Text: Two chatty women gave looks of disgust when I approached with a water and banana. One sharply stated "no cash" followed by a gum slap in her mouth. "Pay over there with a card". She didn't motion, point, or indicate where. I'm fairly certain they accept cash. More certain she shouldn't have a job here.

Name: Kiosk
Review Text: Horrible staff. Super rude already 8am!! Imagine if you order a coffe at 17h...maybe they beat you? I like the cakes and capuccino but the staff made me switch to broodzaak.

Name: Kiosk
Review Text: Go here for my morning coffee. Well oiled machine! Fast, good coffee, friendly and they remember my order:)
